articles.title: SACA CEO Andrew Breetzke on how the Quinton de Kock fallout could have been avoided
articles.description: South African Cricketer's Association chief executive officer Andrew Breetzke said Cricket South Africa should have dealt with the taking the knee matter before the tournament instead of raising it on the world stage.
articles.content:

articles.title: Retired SC judge Raveendran, from failing law exam to Lodha panel on cricket & now Pegasus probe
articles.description: The retired Supreme Court judge has been appointed by the apex court to oversee a three-member technical committee probing the Pegasus snooping allegations.
articles.content: New Delhi: From failing his first-year law exam to now being appointed by the Supreme Court to oversee the committee probing the Pegasus snooping allegations, Justice R.V. Raveendran has come a long … [+5813 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
